channel.title: CVE Feed for Micro Focus -- ArcSight Logger
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Micro Focus -- ArcSight Logger

item.title: CVE-2019-3485|2024-08-04T19:12:09.459Z -- micro%20focus -- arcsight%20logger
item.description: Mitigates a stored cross site scripting issue in ArcSight Logger versions prior to 6.7.1

item.title: CVE-2020-11860|2024-08-04T11:42:00.534Z -- micro%20focus -- arcsight%20logger
item.description: Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability on Micro Focus ArcSight Logger product, affecting all version prior to 7.1.1. The vulnerability could be remotely exploited resulting in Cross-Site Scripting (XSS)

item.title: CVE-2020-11851|2024-08-04T11:42:00.687Z -- micro%20focus -- arcsight%20logger
item.description: Arbitrary code execution vulnerability on Micro Focus ArcSight Logger product, affecting all version prior to 7.1.1. The vulnerability could be remotely exploited resulting in the execution of arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2020-25834|2024-08-04T15:40:37.000Z -- micro%20focus -- arcsight%20logger
item.description: Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability on Micro Focus ArcSight Logger product, affecting version 7.1. The vulnerability could be remotely exploited resulting in Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).
